pr_title: Use property for azure.spring.boot.integration.version in Spring Integration BOM pom.

timeline.message:
On branch edburns-msft-13534-spring-boot-bom-maven-best-practice
modified:   sdk/boms/azure-spring-boot-bom/pom.xml

- Use version property.

On branch edburns-msft-13534-spring-boot-bom-maven-best-practice #13534
modified:   .gitignore

+output/
+temp/

modified:   sdk/boms/azure-spring-boot-bom/pom.xml

- Properties for project.build.sourceEncoding, packageOutputDirectory, <legal

On branch edburns-msft-13534-spring-boot-bom-maven-best-practice
modified:   sdk/boms/azure-spring-boot-bom/pom.xml

- Use version property.

On branch edburns-msft-13534-spring-boot-bom-maven-best-practice
modified:   sdk/boms/azure-spring-boot-bom/pom.xml

- Use version property.

timeline.author: saragluna
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,6 +33,13 @@
     <url>https://github.com/azure/azure-sdk-for-java</url>
   </scm>
 
+  <properties>
+    <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
+    <packageOutputDirectory>${project.build.directory}</packageOutputDirectory>
+    <legal><![CDATA[[INFO] Any downloads listed may be third party software.  Microsoft grants you no rights for third party software.]]></legal>
+    <azure.spring.boot.integration.version>2.2.5-beta.1</azure.spring.boot.integration.version>

timeline.message:
Apply comments from PR

Set version to 2.3.3-beta.1.
